channel.title: [Tutorial] How to get the latest Metaseuqoia for free
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/Untitled_zps6b06503e.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Hello and welcome[/b],
to the tutorial where i'm going to show you how to get the latest version or other a bit older versions available of Metaseuqoia. [/center]
[center][b]____________________________________________________________[/b][/center]
[center][b][size=12pt]1. First step:[/size][/b][/center]
[center]First off , If you haven't downloaded Metaseuqoia head to the download section of the Official Metaseuqoia website:
[url=http://metaseq.net/en/download.html]http://metaseq.net/en/download.html[/url],
And download Version [b]4.0.1[/b] or later, Unless you got or want version [b]3.1[/b] it also works too but a but you'll need to click another link to get a trial for it.
( Keep reading below )[/center]
[center][b]____________________________________________________________[/b][/center]
[center][b][size=12pt]2. Second step:[/size][/b][/center]
[center]Go to the official Metaseuqoia website: [url=http://metaseq.net/en/]http://metaseq.net/en/[/url] , And on the left side of the website you'll see a "Get trial option".
Click it and it will redirect you to a page where you'll need to click another link to start registering for a trial.[/center]
[center][img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/getatrial_zps56841651.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]For version 3.1:[/b][/center]
[center]You'll see another link below "Get Trial" for [b]3.1[/b] Version ONLY. Not more or less.[/center]
[center][b]____________________________________________________________[/b][/center]
[center][b][size=12pt]3. Third step:[/size][/b][/center]
[center]Now that your in to registering for your trial , Input in all the empty boxes with random stuff expect your [b]Email Address[/b], When done just click "Request".[/center]
[center][img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/formsubmittion_zps038d3214.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]____________________________________________________________[/b][/center]
[center][b][size=12pt]4. Fourth step:[/size][/b][/center]
[center]Now that you have requested your trial, Head to your Gmail , yahoo , hotmail or whatever your using. And check for a mail from Metaseuqoia,
Which should contain your [b]SERIAL ID[/b] and [b]PASSWORD[/b] for registering the full Metaseuqoia.[/center]
[center][img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/tirlashow_zps9343b3fe.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]And now here is the trick, For some reason the Metaseuqoia trial system doesn't seem to cross out your email address after you used it,
So you can probably keep registering monthly for a trial and keep your full version for free.
Unless you want to spend your money on it then go ahead.[/b][/center]
[center][b]____________________________________________________________[/b][/center]
[center][b][size=12pt]5. Fifth step:[/size][/b][/center]
[center]Now that you have done everything to get the Serial ID and password, there is one thing left to do.
Which is obviously just inputting your Serial ID and password upon launching the downloaded trial Metaseuqoia. [/center]
[center][img]http://i1081.photobucket.com/albums/j360/naseem142/registering_zpsf99bce68.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]____________________________________________________________[/b][/center]
[center][b]Thank you[/b] for reading this tutorial, And i hope i have helped you and satisfied you. :)[/center]
[center]If this thread is in the wrong section, Please move it to the right one. I didn't really find another appropriate section for it though.[/center]

item.title: [Tutorial] How to get the latest Metaseuqoia for free
item.dc:creator: @TOXSIN TOXSIN
item.description:
@TOXSIN wrote:

Its legit I just downloaded it unfortunately I can’t use it yet because I don’t know how to add customs im just gettting back into server and getting my tools in place but… it works I did ome testing and created a model that did load in the rsmv but I also can’t get the rsmv to load or dl other models

Read full topic

item.title: [Tutorial] How to get the latest Metaseuqoia for free
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You know, you could just monitor in/out going connections, and find which connection is being sent to metaseq’s server’s to check if your copy is valid and then just block that host in the host file on Windows…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:3, topic:546506”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=665406.msg4448059#msg4448059 date=1409910803]
This is beyond ironic… I literally just did this roughly a half hour ago after not being able to find a keygen… I needed this to convert some RS models from max.
[/quote]

Haha , well did you know that you can use it as much as you can?[/quote]

I did not, but I planned on using other e-mails if I needed it, guess I don’t have too now.

Read full topic

item.title: [Tutorial] How to get the latest Metaseuqoia for free
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Hello and welcome,

to the tutorial where i’m going to show you how to get the latest version or other a bit older versions available of Metaseuqoia. [/center]

[center]____________________________________________________________[/center]

[center][size=12pt]1. First step:[/size][/center]

[center]First off , If you haven’t downloaded Metaseuqoia head to the download section of the Official Metaseuqoia website:

http://metaseq.net/en/download.html,

And download Version 4.0.1 or later, Unless you got or want version 3.1 it also works too but a but you’ll need to click another link to get a trial for it.

( Keep reading below )[/center]

[center]____________________________________________________________[/center]

[center][size=12pt]2. Second step:[/size][/center]

[center]Go to the official Metaseuqoia website: http://metaseq.net/en/ , And on the left side of the website you’ll see a “Get trial option”.

Click it and it will redirect you to a page where you’ll need to click another link to start registering for a trial.[/center]

[center][/center]

[center]For version 3.1:[/center]

[center]You’ll see another link below “Get Trial” for 3.1 Version ONLY. Not more or less.[/center]

[center]____________________________________________________________[/center]

[center][size=12pt]3. Third step:[/size][/center]

[center]Now that your in to registering for your trial , Input in all the empty boxes with random stuff expect your Email Address, When done just click “Request”.[/center]

[center][/center]

[center]____________________________________________________________[/center]

[center][size=12pt]4. Fourth step:[/size][/center]

[center]Now that you have requested your trial, Head to your Gmail , yahoo , hotmail or whatever your using. And check for a mail from Metaseuqoia,

Which should contain your SERIAL ID and PASSWORD for registering the full Metaseuqoia.[/center]

[center][/center]

[center][b]And now here is the trick, For some reason the Metaseuqoia trial system doesn’t seem to cross out your email address after you used it,

So you can probably keep registering monthly for a trial and keep your full version for free.

Unless you want to spend your money on it then go ahead.[/b][/center]

[center]____________________________________________________________[/center]

[center][size=12pt]5. Fifth step:[/size][/center]

[center]Now that you have done everything to get the Serial ID and password, there is one thing left to do.

Which is obviously just inputting your Serial ID and password upon launching the downloaded trial Metaseuqoia. [/center]

[center][/center]

[center]____________________________________________________________[/center]

[center]Thank you for reading this tutorial, And i hope i have helped you and satisfied you. :)[/center]

[center]If this thread is in the wrong section, Please move it to the right one. I didn’t really find another appropriate section for it though.[/center]
